resources.string: It is my great pleasure to invite you to explore the Jashore University of Science and Technology (JUST) online through our website. Contribution of science and technology for developing a nation is well known to all. To meet up the diversified demand of people, information and communication technology and biological sciences are playing the key role.\n\nUniversity is the most suitable place for education and research. Universities are playing a vital role in building efficient manpower for the development of the country as well as for the global need. With a view to imparting science and technology oriented education in Bangladesh, the Jashore University of Science and Technology was established in 2007 by the Shadhinota Shorok (Independence Road) in Jashore district. The first batch of students was admitted in 2008-2009 session. The honorable Prime Minister of the Peopleâ€™s Republic of Bangladesh, Sheikh Hasina, inaugurated the campus of the university on December 27, 2010.
Design and Development by\n Computer Science and Engineering Department\n Jashore University of Science and Technology, Jashore.
Upcoming features: Contact search option, Calendar interface upgradation, Vehicle tracking system, Control panel etc.
Simply follow the Sign up and Login instructions to complete your registration to use this application. Here are some issues that you may concern
Please create a strong sassword with minimum 6 characters
Please enter your corresponding department or section or any other category.
After fill up all the input, click on the Sign Up button.
Now this notify you that a email verification link has been sent to your email so, please go to your email and confirm that the given email has real existence/correct.
After verifying your email address please fill up the Login form and click on Login button. Now enjoy our application and don\'t forget to share your opinion to us.
All the input filling up is same for this particular except Department/Section field. For this particular field we have to obey the following instructions.

In this field we have to set the exact name of the faculty with the exact patterns. The must followed pattern is like- \'Faculty of Engineering and Technology\'. We have to set the name which starts with \'Faculty of\' keyword.
For faculties, staff and general students:
